name: Interview (Zouru)
description:
My entry for WGJ 114.

After a bit of brainstorming I somehow landed on this idea, and I decided to do a UI only game (then I remembered I hate doing UI stuff).

You are interviewing for a company that specializes in magically granting wishes for its clients. You have 10 minutes to manage the wishes of 10 individuals. Try your best to make them as happy as possible, without prioritizing one over the other.

Artwork by Anca.

Music: Lifting Dreams by Aakash Gandhi.

Enjoy!
